item.description:
In addition to this Andover location, we have meetups in Reading every day at the same times. If Reading is a better location for you, make sure to sign up for that meetup, not this one.

 

All skill levels are welcome!  Please note, not all events may have a host so check to see who signed up so that you know who to look for.  Make sure you have a profile pic and that it clearly shows your face!  Also, if you're interested in being a volunteer host for this event, mention it in the comments below so people know to look for you.


Please RSVP 'YES' if you're interested.  If something comes up and you cannot make it, come back to the site to update your RSVP to 'NO'.  If you want to come earlier than the scheduled time, mention it in the comments below to see if others are interested.

 

If you've come to at least three of our events, please consider donating $5/year to cover the yearly cost of running the North of Boston Tennis meetup and to help keep the group running!  Members can pay Melissa online via Paypal at http://www.meetup.com/North-of-Boston-Tennis/dues/.  Thank you for your support!
item.name: Weekend Tennis in Andover (Afternoon)
